subject: Glistening
text:
Like a fresh dewdrop of morning, 
And very similar to the 
Realm of sweet desires, 
Today I am just enjoying 
The day's inspiring song
And my running train at its own way. 
Those full bloomed mango trees 
Are the lenient and the glint 
Of quiet spring morning is 
Incredible and very rapturous
For emboldening 
My beloved's beautiful face.
Look at this glorious moment, 
Look beyond the way, 
Nothing is broody today, 
Gathering of reminiscence allowing 
Put my finger down 
To write few more words, 
Few more glistening images 
In my simple free-verse poetic page.
